statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the parallelogram above. Side lengths are measurements.

solution.p: Perimeter is the sum of the sides: \displaystyle{2}{\left({7.09}+{6.65}\right)}={27.48}\approx{27.48}.
Area is height times base (side perpendicular to height): \displaystyle{6.65}\cdot{7.07}={47.0155}\approx{47}.
